data.event: The Villa Grove Post Office (ZIP Code 81155) now serves Bonanza.

event.title: 1880, Tom Cooke of Salida, Colorado stumbled

data.event: In 1880, Tom Cooke of Salida, Colorado stumbled upon ore deposits while searching for horses.

event.title: the first two years of its existence, its population ballooned

data.event: In the first two years of its existence, its population ballooned to between 1,000 and 1,500.
